dmca.title: Google Requested to Take Down Hijab Article
dmca.body:
From: [private], [private]@[private].com, (202)[private] 
RE: Request to remove website from your server ASAP because it was published without my permission.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is an article I wrote, which is pasted below:

Hijab: A Necessity upon Every Muslima
By [private]

For feedback, please mail to: [private]@[private].com

[Copyrighted Full-Text Essay Redacted]

2. The material that is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above is listed in the search results in google.
(a) the search query I used was "[private]," quotes included
(b) the URL for the infringing result is: www.noor.cwc.net/women/33.htm

3. Please contact me at [private]@[private].com or [private].

4. The email address found on the infringer's website is: [private]@[private].co.uk However, I would not count on receiving a response because I already tried emailing him/her four times, and since the website does not seem to have been updated in quite a while, I'm guessing it's an old email address.

5. 1 have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. 1 swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with the United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
